page.discussion: The OLE.CREATE method creates a new OLE automation object. Ole.create can take an optional event handler as either a class with a EventHandler implementation, or a code block with event methods.

section.title: Examples
section.description: This script opens a Microsoft Word template (.dot) and saves the file to a Microsoft Word document(.doc). The usage is usage is Word_Conv_Document("c:\document.dot","C:\document.doc").
